Create a configuration file

Source: R/create_config.R
create_config.Rd

Create a configuration file

create_config(..., path = fs::file_temp("config-", ext = ".yml"))

Arguments

...

String(s) to pass to the ... argument of glue::glue().
path

String giving the path where to save the configuration file.

Value

Invisible path.

See also

FINANCIAL.TIMESTAMP

Other functions to deal with configuration files: default_config(), edit_config(), show_config()

Examples

out <- create_config("
  default:
    field: value
")
#> ✔ Saved to '/var/folders/24/8k48jl6d249_n_qfxwsl6xvm0000gn/T/Rtmp7umqgt/config-ffa6b4b6de6.yml'.
out
#> /var/folders/24/8k48jl6d249_n_qfxwsl6xvm0000gn/T/Rtmp7umqgt/config-ffa6b4b6de6.yml

show_config(out)
#>   default:
#>     field: value
